Uses of Package
videopoker

  • Packages that use videopoker 
    Package Description
    ourvideopoker
    This Package provides an implementation for a videopoker machine based on the interface Videopoker it gives also a variation for the videopoker game that is called the DoubleBonus 10/7 based on the interface VideoPokerVariation
    players
    This package provides different game modes to interact with the interface Videopoker If the videopoker interface is used, the user can use the following game modes: Debug, Interactive, Simulation and GUI The expected commands are the: bet (b), deal (d), hold (h), advise (a), credit ($), statistics (s) and quit (q)
    videopoker
    This package provides a Interface for a Videopoker implementation and also for the variation of that Videopoker it also gives the class's that the Videopooker should return in each play , and finaly the exeption of a invalid play
  • Classes in videopoker used by ourvideopoker 
    Class and Description
    AdviceResult
    Class that represent the Result of a advice play move in the videopoker machine
    BetResult
    Class that represents the result of a bet play move in the videopoker machine , it extends the abstract class Result.
    CreditResult
    Class that represents the Result of the credit command of the videopoker it extends the Result Class
    DealResult
    DealResult is a Class that extends ResultWithHand and represents the result of a deal play move in the videopoker machine
    HoldResult
    Class that represents the Result of the hold playmove
    InvalidPlayException
    This Class implements a Exception for a invalid play in a videopooker machine implemented by the Videopoker interface. it extends the Exception class
    StatisticsResult
    Class that represents the result of the Statistics command insert in the videopoker machine
    Videopoker
    This Interface represents the methods that a videopoker machine has to implement to provide the minimum game functionalities, in our point of view.
    VideoPokerVariation
    This Interface Represents the basic methods that a VideoPokerVariation Class has to give
  • Classes in videopoker used by players 
    Class and Description
    InvalidPlayException
    This Class implements a Exception for a invalid play in a videopooker machine implemented by the Videopoker interface. it extends the Exception class
    Result
    The Result class is an abstract class that represents the result(valid output) of a play in the videopoker machine.
    ResultWithHand
    ResultWithHand Abstract Class that extends the Class Result, this class had been made to extend the result for class's that have also a hand field.
    Videopoker
    This Interface represents the methods that a videopoker machine has to implement to provide the minimum game functionalities, in our point of view.
  • Classes in videopoker used by videopoker 
    Class and Description
    AdviceResult
    Class that represent the Result of a advice play move in the videopoker machine
    BetResult
    Class that represents the result of a bet play move in the videopoker machine , it extends the abstract class Result.
    CreditResult
    Class that represents the Result of the credit command of the videopoker it extends the Result Class
    DealResult
    DealResult is a Class that extends ResultWithHand and represents the result of a deal play move in the videopoker machine
    HoldResult
    Class that represents the Result of the hold playmove
    InvalidPlayException
    This Class implements a Exception for a invalid play in a videopooker machine implemented by the Videopoker interface. it extends the Exception class
    Result
    The Result class is an abstract class that represents the result(valid output) of a play in the videopoker machine.
    ResultWithHand
    ResultWithHand Abstract Class that extends the Class Result, this class had been made to extend the result for class's that have also a hand field.
    StatisticsResult
    Class that represents the result of the Statistics command insert in the videopoker machine
